meanings.sent1: Some thickheads refuse to listen to good advice.
meanings.sent2: The teacher had to deal with a group of thickheads in the class.
meanings.sent3: The thickheads at the party kept telling the same joke over and over.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness made him a thickhead when it came to trying new things.
meanings.sent5: The thickheads in the meeting couldn't understand the simple instructions.

meanings.sent1: The thickheads in the group couldn't solve the puzzle.
meanings.sent2: He was known as the thickhead who always forgot his keys.
meanings.sent3: The thickheads in the family couldn't figure out how to use the new technology.
meanings.sent4: His thickhead nature made it hard for him to see the truth.
meanings.sent5: The thickheads in the forest couldn't find their way out of the maze.
